channel.title: Last Thread about this [NO-IP]
channel.description:
Ok this is annoying now, i still dont have my server online for other people only for me ! Because my IP for the server is 0.0.0.0 but i want that to change to [Servername].no-ip.org
Ok what i've done already :
1. Made a NO_IP IP 2. Downloaded NO-IP Duc
What do i need to do know that people just can come on my server
[ They start up MoparScape, then they type my port and IP and Volia they on my server <<--I JUST WANT THIS!! ]

item.title: Last Thread about this [NO-IP]
item.dc:creator: @zezi111 zezi111
item.description:
@zezi111 wrote:

You need to go to www.no-ip.com made an account made a example.no-ip.org and then open up no-ip DUC and tick the box next to the smiley face beside your no-ip. and make sure you port-forwarded right

Read full topic

item.title: Last Thread about this [NO-IP]
item.dc:creator: @Crispp Crispp
item.description:
@Crispp wrote:

Yeah dude i understand that but how can i change the server IP 0.0.0.0 into My NO-IP?

Read full topic

item.title: Last Thread about this [NO-IP]
item.dc:creator: @_S-Unit_Impulse_Arro {S-Unit} Impulse Arrow
item.description:
@_S-Unit_Impulse_Arro wrote:

You don’t need NO-IP Duc… Just go to www.no-ip.com and Make a No-Ip…

Read full topic

item.title: Last Thread about this [NO-IP]

item.description:
@KingTasty wrote:

make sure you’ve port forwarded but to get the name you want login onto the no-ip website and look around for something that says make new host
